sentence: We have to lean into this civil war in the GOP.? Mrs. Greenes declaration comes as members of the Republican National Committee on Friday censured Rep. Liz Cheney of Wyoming and Rep. Adam Kinzinger of Illinois for their participation as members of the House select committee investigating the Jan. 6, 2021, attack on the U.S. Capitol.
author: Kerry Picket
title: Marjorie Taylor Greene says a GOP intraparty civil war' is necessary

sentence: Then on Friday, the Republican National Committee voted to censure Representatives Liz Cheney and Adam Kinzinger, the two House Republicans on the congressional committee investigating the Jan. 6 attack on the Capitol.
title: Censure Vote Has Republicans Battling Themselves Again
